divs: Sighting Details My family and I were driving to Little Rock atnight,I was driving and my wife was in the passenger seat. There are hills inthe area and we were heading east when I noticed a dim single light coming overthe hill ahead to the right side of the highway very low and I would estimatethe speed at 350 to 400 knots. It was starlike and traveling in a northerndirection,I didnt think much of it untill not far behind it was a group oflights chasing it,three starlike that looked as though they were differentcolors in a small triangular arrangement. They vanashed over the hill on thenorthern side of the highway. I spent ten years in the navy as an aircraftmechanic and have seen my share of every type of aircraft,these lights were notflashing, they were steady and starlike. The distance between the first lightand the three following was I believe about 500 feet.
Summary: Strange lights were seen while driving on Interst
